text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump Are you tweeting this out of your safe home? Or are you out on the front lines with nurses and doctors?? Your insanity never ends instead you are still making this a political thing. Btw, the trump bubble you are in is not COVID19 proof.
